title: Flexport | SDE1 | Bangalore | Declined
content:
College: Tier 3
Education: BTech( CSE )
Years of Experience: ~3
previous company - Fintech Unicorn

Company: Flexport
Title/Level: SDE-1 (Downleveled from SDE2)
Location: Hybrid (Banglore, India)
Base Salary: 27,00,000
Signing Bonus: 3 LPA
Perf bonus : 10% of base
RSU: Don't remember, didn't get far into comp discussion post offer.
Vesting Period: -
RSU per year: -

title: UKG | Lead Software Engineer | 2024
content:
Education: B.Tech (IT - Tier 3)
Years of Experience: 4years
Prior Experience: Tier 3 Product based company and Service based(50-50)
Current Salary: **17LPA**
Date of the Offer: August 2024
Company: **UKG** (Ultimate Kronos Group)
Title/Level: Lead Software Engineer
Location: Noida
Salary: **26LPA**
Stock bonus: 1LPA
Bonus: 2LPA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): **29LPA**
Benefits: Standard benefits (free lunch + cab(500 montly charge) + Quarterly reimbursements worth 14k for personal health and home office expenses)


Other details: 
* Walmart had low-balled me in March 2024 for SDE-III. - https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5028660/walmart-sde-iii-bangalore/2427932
* They were offering 12% raise on fixed component
* giving a total package of 18fixed + 4.5RSU + 3.6Bonus = 26.1LPA
* I REJECTED that offer and kept applying
* Got a better one within 6 months :)

title: Expedia SDE-2  vs  Zepto SDE-2
content:
Education: B.Tech CSE Tier-3
Years of Experience: 2.4 years
Prior Experience: SDE-1 at E-commerce D2C startup


Date of the Offer: Sept 2024
Company: **Expedia**
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Gurgaon
Salary: 23L (incl PF + gratuity )
Relocation : 4L
Signing Bonus: 2L
Stock bonus: 11.5k $ over 4 years
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + JB + Relo bonus + Stock): ~32L (1st year) ~26L (2nd year)
Benefits: Standard Expedia Benefits (7500/month for Travel allowance, ~70k Wellness benefit and other benefits etc. ~ 2 lakh/yr )







Date of the Offer: Sept 2024
Company: **Zepto**
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 32L fixed (incl PF )
Signing Bonus: 2L
Stock bonus: 32 lakh over 4 years (25% each)
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + JB + Stock): ~42L (1st year) ~40L (2nd year)
Benefits: NA

Please share your thoughts, heard very bad WLB at zepto although base salary is great , Any idea about Zepto IPO ?
need help, should i prefer Expedia over Zepto coz of good WLB & brand value ?

title: VeARC Technologies | Engineering Lead | Bangalore
content:
Education: BTech 
Years of Experience: 10
Prior Experience: Senior Engineer at product based company
Prior CTC : 62 Lakhs
Date of the Offer: Sep 2024
Company: VeARC Technologies 
Title/Level:  Engineering Lead
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 56.2 Lakhs (Including PF/Gratuity)
Variable:  5 Lakhs
Joining Bonus: 3 Lakhs (Need to return if left within 2 years)
Stock bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Variable + Stock): ~ 61.2 Lakhs
Benefits: Usual benefits like Insurance etc.
Other details: Declined the offer as no major hike from current. Also, WFO for 5 days/week with 12 PM - 9 PM shift.
